# Anotaciones

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(reticulate)
library(gcookbook)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r, out.width="50%", out.height="50%", fig.align='center'}
p <- ggplot(faithful, aes(x = eruptions, y = waiting)) +
  geom_point()

p +
  annotate("text", x = 3, y = 48, label = "Group 1") +
  annotate("text", x = 4.5, y = 66, label = "Group 2")
```
